main event: A sighting of an unidentified flying object occurred on March 6, 1960, in Dalton, Massachusetts.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 20 seconds and featured one object,The object's behavior was described as distinctive and it fell from the sky,Investigations were conducted of an area where an object fell, indicating a lack of observable objects from which it could have fallen.,A report was classified as unidentified by Project Blue Book, indicating interest from government officials.,The report discussed the investigation of falling ice from the sky around the same time period.
witness description: Mrs. Anna Dalton reported seeing the object while standing on her front porch.
